Name: ``lsq-exact``
Description: Trust region least squares method, similar to the `trf` method in scipy

Name: ``dogleg``
Description: Trust region method using Powell's dogleg method to approximately solve the trust region subproblem.

Name: ``subspace``
Description: Trust region method solving the subproblem over the 2d subspace spanned by the gradient and newton direction.

Name: ``dogleg-bfgs``
Description: Trust region method using Powell's dogleg method to approximately solve the trust region subproblem. Uses BFGS to approximate hessian

Name: ``subspace-bfgs``
Description: Trust region method solving the subproblem over the 2d subspace spanned by the gradient and newton direction. Uses BFGS to approximate hessian

Name: ``sgd``
Description: Stochastic gradient descent with Nesterov momentum

Name: ``scipy-bfgs``
Description: BFGS quasi-newton method with line search. See https://docs.scipy.org/doc/scipy/reference/optimize.minimize-bfgs.html

Name: ``scipy-dogleg``
Description: Trust region method with dogleg step. Requires the hessian to be positive definite. See https://docs.scipy.org/doc/scipy/reference/optimize.minimize-dogleg.html

Name: ``scipy-trust-exact``
Description: Trust region method using 'exact' method to solve subproblem. See https://docs.scipy.org/doc/scipy/reference/optimize.minimize-trustexact.html

Name: ``scipy-trust-ncg``
Description: Trust region method using conjugate gradient to solve subproblem. See https://docs.scipy.org/doc/scipy/reference/optimize.minimize-trustncg.html

Name: ``scipy-trust-krylov``
Description: Trust region method using Kyrlov iterations to solve subproblem. See https://docs.scipy.org/doc/scipy/reference/optimize.minimize-trustkrylov.html

Name: ``scipy-trf``
Description: Trust region least squares method. See https://docs.scipy.org/doc/scipy/reference/generated/scipy.optimize.least_squares.html

Name: ``scipy-lm``
Description: Levenberg-Marquardt implicit trust region method. See https://docs.scipy.org/doc/scipy/reference/generated/scipy.optimize.least_squares.html

Name: ``scipy-dogbox``
Description: Dogleg method with box shaped trust region. See https://docs.scipy.org/doc/scipy/reference/generated/scipy.optimize.least_squares.html

Name: ``scipy-trust-constr``
Description: Trust region interior point method. See https://docs.scipy.org/doc/scipy/reference/optimize.minimize-trustconstr.html

Name: ``scipy-SLSQP``
Description: Sequential least squares programming method. See https://docs.scipy.org/doc/scipy/reference/optimize.minimize-slsqp.html
